features: >> >>Loop-End Design 18oz mop head with looped-end , yarn tailband prevent the loops from getting tangle and reduce fraying. And it also helps the loops flat on the floor for maximum surface area contact

>> >>Double Thick Cotton-Synthetic Yarn We choose very good quality Cotton-Synthetic as material , highly versatile mop is able to absorb any dirty water quickly and clean all types of mess . it make your daily life cleaning more easily . Mop head replacement ASIN :B088PR33B2
>> >>59 inch Aluminium Alloy handle : Light weight handle with 59 inch length ,No need to bend for mopping the floor , very suitable for USA market

>>>> Installation: Thumb wheel can be screwed up or down for helping release the mop head or tightly clamp the mop head down into the position . A side gate for easily remove and replace mop head, Simply open the latch, slip the mop head into the position ,then clip the gate tightly

>> >>Multi-purpose use Our versatile wet floor mop is perfect for commercial and home floor cleaning jobs . It can be used to clean tile floor, marble floor, concrete floor, and wood floor. Product warranty period of 30 days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was concerned when it quickly showed up in a small box but after pulling it out of the box I was pleasantly surprised! Well maid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The mop pole and mount work great and for the price you cant beat it, Would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight and Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: I love this product! It is light weight and very easy to use. It makes mopping my floors a non strenuous activity. This mop is big enough to do my 2000 square feet of floors in about 10 minutes. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was too heavy for me to use mopping the floor. May be ok for people that are physically fit. But the mop is well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars extra mop head.....
reviews.reviewText: love this mop and clean much much better than my other one, plus the mop handle can be raised or lowered which is a definite plus as i am small so can adjust it. excellent mop and very reasonably priced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: Great mop for our large living room. Good to have a large industrial bucket to squeeze the excess since it is large.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's very hard to find good mopsLook at several stores the mops they have break so easily this mop has a heavy duty handle I've had it for months no issues

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap & Prone to Rust
reviews.reviewText: Has this mop for a little over a year. The plastic end cap broke off after the first couple of months. Not a big deal but slightly annoying because it is uncomfortable to grab the mop handle by the end without the cap on it. The cap just wasn't built to last or to stay on there well enough.I've had the mop for about 19 months now, but the biggest issue is the mop head mount (the part that gets wet) is not stainless steel. It is very prone to rust. The whole thing has become a nasty, rusty, reddish brown. It's rusted so badly I need to replace it. This mop is a good temporary solution, but buy something with strainless steel and with a solid wood handle if you want something that will last several years.
